mapper.select: SELECT a.purchaseTime, b.lessonType,a.totalLessonNum,a.lessonLeftNum,c.parentName,c.telNum,d.name FROM ordersum a INNER JOIN order_teaching_r b ON a.orderId = b.orderId INNER JOIN parents c ON a.parentId=c.parentId INNER JOIN student d ON a.memberId = d.memberId WHERE b.teacherId=#{teacherId}
